p: A comparison of the new MDV isolates with the MDV previously reported by our group (BR/07; GenBank: GU452720) shows a nucleotide identity of 98.4% with the sequence amplified from strain A and an identity of 96.2% with the one amplified from strain B P.0 ( Table). It is important to note that the C6/36 cell cultures in our laboratory are routinely checked for insect viral contaminations, including MDV, due to our reference laboratories activities for the Brazilian Ministry of Health.
